body: query {transactionlist ({argumentation}) { transactions { id, amount, created_at, updated_at, merchant_provider { id }, rebill { id, bill_at, amount, parentsession { id, customer { id, firstname, lastname, address { line1, line2, city, state, zip } } }, product_schedules { id, merchantprovidergroup{ id, merchantproviderconfigurations { merchantprovider { id, name, processor { name }, processing { monthly_cap, discount_rate, transaction_fee, reserve_rate, maximum_chargeback_ratio}, enabled, gateway { ... on NMI { name, username, password, processor_id } ... on Innovio { name, username, password, product_id } ... on Stripe {name, api_key} }, allow_prepaid, accepted_payment_methods, customer_service { email, url, description }, created_at, updated_at }, distribution }, created_at, updated_at }, schedule { price, start, end, period, product { id } } } }, processor_response, products { amount, product { id, name, sku, ship, shipping_delay, fulfillment_provider { id, name, provider { name } } }, shippingreceipt { id, created_at, updated_at, status, tracking { carrier, id } } } }, pagination { count, end_cursor, has_next_page, last_evaluated } }, }
